response.overview: This work was created using film from the LUX archive by artists Alan Berliner, Lawrence Jordan, People Like Us, Semiconductor and the Estate of Stan Vanderbeek. The aim of the commission was to further promote work in the LUX archive. Permission was sought from the artists and their work was then collaged, rearranged and altered to create a new work Resemblage. Commissioned by LUX.
response.title: Resemblage
